comment: No, while The Stream enables users to upload content, the thematic decisions involved with curating the clips and content for the hour long show as well as what is featured on the website, is ultimately up to the staff. Although the idea is to capture a kind of zeitgeist that responds to users interests, participation and comments, the editorial decisions are static.
users are invited to "connect and share," but the overall format of the show and its contents are decided by the FSE.
